body:
Nearly there. Just to keep the Dalai Lama happy, we need to output with 
2 decimal places: 15 / 4 = 3.75


fprintf(WEA_FILE,"time_zone %.2f\n",-15.0*atoi(time_zone));


Job done. Thanks, Greg


Regards


Axel
